    • Camera

      public Camera​(Point3D p0, Vector vTo, Vector vUp)
      camera constructor- received p0, vto, vup calculate vright - the cross product between vto and vup
      Parameters:
      p0 - - the camera starting point
      vTo - - one vector
      vUp - - the second vector

    • constructRayThroughPixel

      public Ray constructRayThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i, double screenDistance, double screenWidth, double screenHeight)
      calculate the ray from the camera starting point to current pixel (j,i)
      Parameters:
      nX - - number of pixels in x axis
      nY - - number of pixels in y axis
      j - - location of current pixel in the row
      i - - location of current pixel in the column
      screenDistance - - the distance between the camera and view plane
      screenWidth - - the width plane in cm
      screenHeight - - the width plane in cm
      Returns:
      the ray from the starting point to current pixel
